mapper.update: update mkt_cam_script set MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = #{evtContactConfId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SCRIPT_DESC = #{scriptDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAN_ID = #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where MKT_CAMPAIGN_SCPT_ID = #{mktCampaignScptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAMPAIGN_SCPT_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, SCRIPT_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_script where MKT_CAMPAIGN_SCPT_ID = #{mktCampaignScptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_SCPT_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, SCRIPT_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_script where EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID = #{evtContactConfId}
select MKT_CAMPAIGN_SCPT_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EVT_CONTACT_CONF_ID, SCRIPT_DESC, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_script
